page.title: 10Local Policeman in Ilford
page.content:
Police Constable Don P.C. Don is one of the best known people in Chadwell Heath. He travels round on his beat every day and always has a{friendly}word for everyone. he often comes into schools, giving talks and information about the job of a {policeman.}He often out at the local church and at school fetes. He is based at Chadwell Heath{Police {Station}in Wangey Road. He often shows visiting children round the station. Sometimes he even lets them put hand- cuffs on and go into the lock-up cell. There is a kennel out the back, near where the cars are parked.
Mikala Bostock, Class 2 Chadwell Heath Primary School.
